What? No one metions me? *pouts* I'm just kidding. I don't really care. I=
 just want to be in this RPG. I'm going back to RPGing now. Yanshosh is goi=
ng to be mad if I don't stop doing posts that don't envolve my bots. I'm go=
ing back to RPGing. :-/

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dcoburn 
 =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, August 31, 2000 7:15 PM
  Subjec=
t: HAPPY BIRTHDAY NEO BEAST WARS!!!!



       
       My Groups | nbwrpg M=
ain Page | Start a new group!  



  (OOC: I almost forgot!!!  Happy Birthd=
ay NBWRPG!!!  I have not been here very long, I joined early in August I th=
ink.  I haven't been around for some of the major changes.  I'm glad to be =
part of the NBW community, and I'm glad to have all you people here to talk=
 to, and RP with!!!!  I have a couple thank yous to give out:
   
  Yanshos=
h yanshosh@... -For letting me be on the list, and letting me help out =
with the char and members page and for being a good owner,moderator, RPmate=
 and a friend.
   
  Logomorph logomorph@... -For boosting my spiri=
ts, and making days of my life happier, and being a good RPmate.
   
  Soul=
stice thecode@... -For being a good RPmate.  Even if people don't l=
isten to him!!
   
  KSLawdogg KSLawdogg@... -For being a good moderator=
 and a good RPmate.
   
  Inferno Inferno731@... -For being a good mode=
rator.
   
  JP JP3884@... -For being a good moderator, RPmate and bein=
g a good writer.
   
  Wilddance_Mare wilddance_mare@... -For being=
 a good moderator, and a good RPmate.
   
  Carnage carnage@... -Fo=
r being a good, expressive writer.
   
  Everyone -For being part of this R=
PG, and being good RPers in general.
   
  Neo Beast Wars RPG itself nbwrpg=
@egroups.com -For revealing to me a huge part of myself, and for being ther=
e, and for putting up with all the emails, and members it gets.
   
  eGrou=
ps -For being a major part of my life as well, opening up the world of RPin=
g and friends.  
   
  Thank you all!!!!!!!!!  Big thanks!!!!!!!!!  
   
  =
